translated: (The method of exposition in the Paṭṭhāna is as follows:)🔽The two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna are to be treated in the same way as the two triplets and the two couplets in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.69. Sanidassanattika, Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nacittasaṁsaṭṭho
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa ni dassana ttika citta sa sa ṭṭha duka  anidassana appaṭigham citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ
translated: With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭighaḥ na citta sa saṭṭhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe a nidassana appaṭigha
translated: With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.

original: cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.🔽With the exception of the two triplets and the two couplets in the Paṭṭhāna, the remaining method of exposition is the same as that in the Vibhaṅga.

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
